basics.name: Danilo Caceres
basics.title: System Support Specialist with focus in Technical Support
basics.summary: Hello, I am Danilo Cáceres. I have over 10 years of experience in server technical support. Currently, I am in my first formal work experience.

experience.summary: Creation of a website with backend and frontend for a canine hotel. Frontend created with HTML5 and CSS. Backend created in Bash script and connection to a MySQL database.
